Hello, for the first time ever I've successfully docked parts to the KSS in orbit. However, my alignment was not in the correct orientation. Is there a way to rotate the docking port / parts already connected and in orbit? All the guides I've found are for KSP1 and right-click does not give me the option to rotate. 

 

Image here: https://imgur.com/a/lYthyQK
Not at the moment. Your best bet right now is to try to undock, align and dock back.
Oh no! This is nearly impossible for me. It's so difficult. Thank you for the help though.
